title: 4 - Please Stop Loving The Sinner And Hating The Sin
description:
In this week's episode, we talk about how love debunks the cultural catch phrase "Love the Sinner, Hate the Sin.", Mike yells in his office, and Mike answers a great question about Feminism in the church.

As referenced, check out Scot McKnight's Fellowship of Differents

- Mike Erre

Learn more about the VOX Podcast:
www.voxpodcast.com
